teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Susan Comeau Nguyen Freedom Fund
teams.loan_because: Susan dedicated her life to helping the disadvantaged and hurting.  By helping others, we perpetuate her memory and legacy.
teams.description: A team dedicated to helping others obtain freedom from want and hunger.

teams.name: The Susan R. Comeau-Nguyen Pay it Forward Fund
teams.loan_because:
The amazing Susan R. Comeau-Nguyen from Colorado Springs passed away from cancer on 11/27/12.  Susan was only 41 years old, and her 3 year old son, husband, parents, friends and family will all miss her dearly. 

Susan was a counselor who helped many people to tear down whatever wasn't working in their lives.  Even with no hair Susan had the most positive outlook, and was always living her best life at every possible moment.  To many it was such a blessing to have known Susan, and to have had the chance to walk some of the best footsteps of life with her.

Just a few weeks before her death a dear friend asked Susan if there was anything she could do for her, and Susan's request was to please send some money to a family that she wanted to help for Christmas. Even up to the end Susan was giving and helping others.
teams.description:
The Susan R. Comeau-Nguyen Pay it Forward Fund is dedicated to carrying forthword Susan's incredible spirit, honoring her generous heart, and keeping her forever a star in the sky. 

Susan's wishes, in lieu of a service, were for people to donate microloans through Kiva.  Susan asked that we all pay it forward by doing an extravagantly generous act of kindness or service, either intentional or random, for stranger or friend, for someone in need.  
Susan....YOU GOT IT!

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Genealogists for Families
teams.loan_because:
we care about families (past, present and future).

'There are people trying to change this world that seems to be going down. Some people think there is nothing that can be done... But then there is you, who really do believe that it is still possible.'
teams.description:
Genealogists worldwide (plus relatives and friends) have found a simple way to help less fortunate families. In 2011 'Genealogists for Families' received an award for Best New Community Project.

Through Kiva, a non-profit organisation working with microfinance institutions, you choose a borrower to support with a loan of just $5 (through Kiva Zip) or $25 (on the main Kiva site). Similar loans by other lenders are combined until the required total is reached. This enables people without access to traditional banks (including many women) to expand their businesses, support and educate their children, save for the future and raise themselves out of poverty. As your money is repaid (often in monthly instalments), you can withdraw it or lend it to someone else. Money that is loaned over and over again does more good than a one-time donation!

Anyone *who makes a loan* through Kiva can be a member of this team. You can invite your family and friends to join even if they are not involved in genealogy.

** Please read http://genfamilies.blogspot.com/search/label/FAQ (which has important information and answers to frequently asked questions).

teams.name: VanillaSoft Inc.
teams.loan_because: Businesses helping Businesses is our mission.  We were all small once and needed a little help and some funding.  You and VanillaSoft together can improve your business and make a big difference in someone else’s business.  Join Team VanillaSoft today!
teams.description: Team VanillaSoft is made up of employees, customers, friends and supporters all dedicated to helping others have the same success we have enjoyed. Individually we may only be able to do a little.  Collectively, we can do a bundle.

teams.name: Higher Life
teams.loan_because: We believe in the Greatness of the human race. A world without boundaries of race, creed, colour, or religion where we all work together as one family to win AS ONE!
teams.description: We are beings with businesses of our own and understand the challenges and victories of owning & growing a business. We believe that we are blessed to have abundance most by helping others grow their own abundance. We work so that we can live a "Higher Life", one that is built upon the foundations of Love, Hope, Faith(trust), and the belief that anything is possible. It is also our honour & duty to give/lend to our global family which helps them achieve their own "Higher Life".

teams.name: Baruch College
teams.loan_because: credit is the driver of progress and self-reliance. It should be available to everyone.
teams.description: Baruch students are a diverse, spirited and primarily a low-income bunch. Our education was financed in full or partially through state/federal aid, and someday we hope to give back. Due to that we are able to directly relate to borrowers across the world. *Note: We are a group of students who attend/attended Baruch College; the college is NOT affiliated with this program in any form or function*

teams.loan_because:
We believe in creating a product that will impact the world and give back to communities worldwide. That's why we've created a product that is gentle to the world, but also happens to be gentle and sweet for your skin.

How's that for a Win-Win?
teams.description: A community of awe-inspiring people who are here to make a difference in people's lives that lack the banking and financial system in their communities to fulfill their lifelong entrepreneurial dreams.

teams.name: Team Japan
teams.loan_because: we feel that we can help the world, one person at a time.
teams.description:
There are many Kiva lenders who live in Japan, and we hope to be able to make a difference, not only as individuals, but now as a team. Please feel free to join us....not only from anywhere in Japan, but anywhere in the world. All you need is an interest in Japan. 

一緒に貧困をなくしましょう．．．お待ちしています！

(Picture: Mt. Fuji and the full moon at sunrise New Year's Day 2010 写真：朝日の富士山と満月２０１０年元日）

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Nansen
teams.loan_because: Global changes starts with local actions
teams.description: Nansen is a digital agency based in Stockholm, London, Chicago, New York and Washington D.C

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Newberg Friends Kiva Team
teams.loan_because: We believe part of what it means to follow Jesus is to help others around the world.
teams.description: We are part of a church in Newberg, Oregon, and want to use what God has given us to help others.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Wimmera District, Victoria, Australia
teams.loan_because:
"Microfinance stands as one of the most promising and cost-effective tools in the fight against global poverty."
Jonathan Morduch, Chair, UN Expert Group on Poverty Statistics
teams.description:
This team is an open team and therefore anyone is invited to contribute and be part of the team, whether they are associated with the wimmera or not.

"Where once the poor were commonly seen as passive victims, microfinance recognizes that poor people are remarkable reservoirs of energy and knowledge. And while the lack of financial services is a sign of poverty, today it is also understood as an untapped opportunity to create markets, bring people in from the margins and give them the tools with which to help themselves."
Kofi Annan

teams.name: Rotary and Kiva
teams.loan_because: fighting poverty, improving quality of life, and building goodwill and friendship are values we all share
teams.description: Rotarians making a difference by using microcredit through Kiva

teams.name: Denmark
teams.loan_because:
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood. 
(Article 1  of United Nations Declaration of Human Rights)
teams.description:
Team for everyone in Denmark, who are taking part of this great opportunity to improve the world one step at a time.

Use this to recruite friends. http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Location: HeartMath Denmark
Street: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 floor , 1202 Copenhagen K

More Info:: Facebook-group: Kiva Denmark  link: http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gruppen her er for alle i Danmark, der støtter denne fantastiske ide om at hjælpe verden ét skridt af gangen.

Vil du hjælpe: Inviter venner - fortæl om Kiva 
http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Kiva Denmark holder møder om hvad vi kan gøre for at udbrede kendskabet til denne unikke måde at hjælpe på. Kontakt: Kristine.flagstad@uni-c.dk hvis du har nogen ideer eller skriv en meddelelse her til gruppen.

Næste møde holdes hos: HeartMath Danmark
Adresse: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 sal, 1202 Copenhagen K
Dato: Ikke fastlagt pt. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Se evt. mere på facebook gruppen : http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

teams.loan_because: Global changes starts with local actions
teams.description: Nansen is a digital agency based in Stockholm, London, Chicago, New York and Washington D.C

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,

We'll share our wealth,

and back again,

teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Christians Against Abortion
teams.loan_because: We want to be obedient to Jesus Christ: 'But love your enemies, do good, and lend, expecting nothing in return; and your reward will be great, and you will be sons of the Most High...' Luke 6:35
teams.description:
A group of believers in Jesus Christ, ready to sacrifice to follow Him.    

---- (1) We are committed to defending the unborn.   

The words of Jesus speak strongly to us in the present situation: 
'And when Jesus saw it, he was angry, and said to them, Let the little children come to me, and do not keep them away; for of such is the kingdom of God.' Mark 10:14 
'Whoever receives this little child in my name receives me, and whoever receives me receives him who sent me.' Luke 9:48

---- (2) We are motivated by the biblical call to equality: 'For I do not mean that others should be eased and you burdened; but at the present time your abundance should supply their need, so that their abundance may supply your need, that there may be equality.' 2 Corinthians 8:13-14

---- (3) We want to build this team of like-minded poeple as a place of encouragment and care. 

Join, if you believe in all the words of Jesus.

teams.name: Supporting Widows and Single Parents
teams.loan_because: Widows and single parents face unique challenges in life. We just want to make it a bit easier for them.
teams.description: We loan to entrepreneurs who have been widowed or who are single parents.

teams.name: Endangered Beekeepers
teams.loan_because: "We ought to do good to others as simply as a horse runs, or a bee makes honey, or a vine bears grapes season after season without thinking of the grapes it has borne."  -Marcus Aurelius
teams.description: We support honeybees, their keepers, and all who toil season after season to do good for the human hive.   Our team photo is of Carmen, a Peruvian beekeeper and Kiva loan recipient.

teams.name: Raising Other People's Children.
teams.loan_because: We want to help those who are helping above and beyond their means.
teams.description:
Sometimes loan descriptions are listed of people raising their relatives kids; raising their siblings or paying for them to attend school; seemingly poor people who have shared what little they have with adoptive children; people who already have children and have adopted more. 

Much of the time, the reasons for caring for other people’s children are not given, in Africa it could be assumed that it is because parents have succumbed to AIDS.

Whatever the reasons –  this is a team to deposit such loans into so others can easily find them.

teams.name: Disabled Persons
teams.loan_because: This is a community of people interested in making a difference for entrepreneurs  and families who are affected by illness or physical, intellectual, or psychiatric disability.  We also support caregivers, entrepreneurs involved in the medical profession and anyone who is touched in any way by disabilities, chronic illnesses or one time medical needs.
teams.description:
Anyone who has an interest in disability issues or rights may join our team. This team was started as a way to find and keep track of Kiva entrepreneurs who are affected by illnesses or disabilities so that we might see what kind of difference we are making in the lives of these entrepreneurs. 

This team was originally created by a group of KivaFriends, but has always been open to anyone.  If you are interested, you can read about the team history here:

teams.name: People Who Care About Women AND Men
teams.loan_because: We care about all people and believe that poor men should have the same access to micro loans as poor women.
teams.description: We are concerned that many Microfinance Institutions (MFI's) make loans exclusively or primarily to women.  Our fathers, brothers and sons need the same access to opportunity that women do so that they can take care of themselves and their families.  To try to provide equal opportunities to men, we will loan money exclusively to needy men until the issue of gender equality is adequately addressed in the MFI community.

teams.name: Nansen
teams.loan_because: Global changes starts with local actions
teams.description: Nansen is a digital agency based in Stockholm, London, Chicago, New York and Washington D.C

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Sheffield enterprise alliance
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference
teams.description: A group of Businesses and/or enterpreneurs

teams.name: The Cherry Blossoms
teams.loan_because: We want to contribute to the entrepreneurial efforts of women in other countries.
teams.description: We are a group of friends, and friends of friends, in Washington, DC and afar. The team was created one night during Snowmaggedon 2010 and enthusiastically welcomes new friends into this circle of inspirational lending.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Dutton Family Team
teams.loan_because: We want to give back and share with others around the world. This is a great way to help someone help themselves.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious

teams.name: Pinoys with Promise
teams.loan_because: Everyone has the potential to be great and accomplish remarkable things . Sometimes, a little support and a helping hand is all that it takes to begin a new and exciting journey. Filipinos are incredible people. Full of vibrant care and constantly thinking of new and innovative ideas. Our intentions are to support those individuals who can not fully support themselves. We do this by believing in their visions, their dreams and themselves.
teams.description: Pinoys with Promise is a team dedicated to supporting struggling entrepreneurs that possess great potential and a drive for success. Helping us help others will prove beneficial and advantageous to the thousands of filipinos whose voices can't be heard yet internally strive to do and be more.

teams.name: Liberal Party of Canada

teams.loan_because: Wenn viele zusammen an einem Strang ziehen, kann viel Gutes getan werden. Deshalb sind wir hier auf Kiva.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Be a Better Bank
teams.loan_because: Our goal is to create micro-financing opportunities to people in need- specifically in Ukraine. We believe in volunteerism and in supporting local entrepreneurs to a difference in their own lives and strengthen their community. We are working to create a network that can leverage resources and help Peace Corps Volunteers make even more of a difference in Ukraine.
teams.description: We are Peace Corps Volunteers who currently or previously served in Ukraine, as well as like minded family and friends. We loan to Ukrainian entrepreneurs to broaden our scope in developing individual skills and developing communities across the country.

teams.name: Kiva: A Festivus Miracle
teams.loan_because: Between the Airing of Grievances and the Feats of Strength, we micro-lend.

Make a loan - we buy 7,400+ shares.
teams.description:
We hang out on a social network called Empire Avenue.

If you are on Empire Avenue and you make a loan, the team will collectively buy more than 7,400 shares in you -- a great incentive!

teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com

teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Thorpes
teams.loan_because: We care and we believe that Entrepreneurship is the best way to help people and their communities out of poverty.
teams.description: Businesses supporting businesses across the globe.

teams.name: Sealions
teams.loan_because:
Because we want to support disadvantaged groups and projects in their leadership and help their dreams come true. We believe in leadership and in change. We believe that:
- leaders show up in the world in many places and many circumstances. 
- the world needs leaders now more than at any other time in history.
- the new leaders may come from non-traditional groups or organisations. 
- families and communities offer opportunities for leadership at many levels. 
- small catalysts create big changes in our world.
teams.description: The Sealions came together as a tribe in October 2009 to complete the Coaches Training Institute 10 month leadership programme in Spain. We gathered from places as far apart as Brazil, Japan, Egypt, Israel, Sweden and the UK. We were drawn together by our wish to bring better leadership to the world. We stay together for the same reason. Lending through Kiva is a way for us to maintain a shared interest and to foster community leadership.

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: Nansen
teams.loan_because: Global changes starts with local actions
teams.description: Nansen is a digital agency based in Stockholm, London, Chicago, New York and Washington D.C

teams.name: Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All
teams.loan_because: 2.6 billion people, or 40% of the world, lack access to basic sanitation. The resulting disease causes nearly 2 million deaths, 10% of the global disease burden, and $84 billion in worker productivity loss each year. The high population density combined with the lack of infrastructure and resources makes the problem particularly acute in slums, where populations will double to 2 billion by 2030. Kenya is at the epicenter of this crisis with 10 million people living in slums, 80% of whom lack access to basic sanitation.
teams.description:
Members of Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All enjoy seeing Sanergy's Fresh Life Operators receive loans for, and operate their Fresh Life Toilet businesses in Kenya.

Sanergy promotes the fundamental human right to sanitation in the slums of Kenya by increasing access to and usage of hygienic sanitation facilities. Sanergy creates an efficient, equitable, and sustainable sanitation cycle by building a dense network of small-scale sanitation centers across the slums, a low-cost containerized waste collection infrastructure, and converting this waste at a central processing facility into electricity, fertilizer, and other high-margin products.

Sanergy is an official Kiva field partner.

teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Chi-Town's Finest
teams.loan_because: During the Holiday season in 2011, our group of friends, together since 3rd grade, decided to give gifts to each other through giving to others. We loan because our lives have been blessed, time to share the wealth.
teams.description: Our team has been close friends since we were children. We've managed to stay in touch over the years even as we pursue our lives all over the country and the world. We hope that through Kiva, we can support those who are growing and working to better their lives, while adding one more memory to our long lasting friendships.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.description: We are a family.  We care and want to make a difference in our world.  This seems like a perfect opportunity for doing that.
